cancelOpenBid(uint256).details: Cancel an open bid and reclaim funds.

params.bidId: ID of the bid to cancel

constructor.details: Constructor function to initialize the contract.

params._weth: Address of the WETH token contract

getBid(uint256).details: Get the packed representation of all open bids.

getBidIdByBundleHash(bytes32).details: Get the bid ID corresponding to a bundle hash.

params.bundleHash: Hash of the L1 tx bundle

getBidIdByDetails(uint120,uint128).details: Get the bid ID corresponding to bid details.

params.amountOfGas: Amount of gas to bid for

getBidIdBySender(address).details: Get the bid ID corresponding to a sender.

openBid(uint128,uint120,bytes32).details: Make a bid for a beta gas space with a bundle hash retreived from mev_sendBetaBundle. Pay up front. Unfilled bid funds can be reclaimed by cancelling.

params.amountOfGas: Amount of gas in the bid
params.bundleHash: Hash of the L1 tx bundle
params.weiPerGas: Wei per gas in the bid

submitBundles(uint256).details: Submit bundle hashes for a finished auction slot. If the auction slot has already been submitted or is still open, the function reverts. Once the submission is successful, the slot is marked as finished.

params.slot: Slot number of the finished auction
